Body:
httpretty.register_uri(httpretty.POST,
    'https://www.hpit-project.org/new-resource', body=
    '{"resource_id":"1234"}', content_type='application/json')
self.test_plugin.secure_resource.when.called_with(None).should.throw(
    InvalidParametersError)
self.test_plugin.secure_resource.when.called_with('').should.throw(
    InvalidParametersError)
self.test_plugin.secure_resource.when.called_with([]).should.throw(
    InvalidParametersError)
self.test_plugin.secure_resource.when.called_with({}).should.throw(
    InvalidParametersError)
self.test_plugin.secure_resource('4').should.equal('1234')
httpretty.activate
